articles.author: Jack Bantock, CNN
articles.title: Frustrated golfer goes on tirade after having to play awkward drain shot at US Open
articles.description: Two-time major winner Justin Thomas has enjoyed many happy Saturdays of golf. The third round at the 2022 US Open is unlikely to rank among them.

articles.title: Video: Russian attacks take devastating toll on Ukrainian city - CNN Video
articles.description: Russian attacks take a devastating toll on the city of Lysychansk, Ukraine. Thousands of people are huddled in basements and bomb shelters without running water, electricity and communications. CNN's Ben Wedeman reports.

articles.author: Nicole Goodkind, CNN Business
articles.title: The most popular air travel day this year was a mess. That won't change anytime soon
articles.description: Americans gained a new federal holiday last year: Juneteenth. This year the holiday, which commemorates of the end of slavery in the United States, falls on Sunday but it will be observed in many places on Monday, June 20.

articles.title: Three reasons gas prices are expected to stay high - CNN Video
articles.description: Record setting gas prices show no signs of slowing down, CNN's Matt Egan explains why global issues are continuing to cause pain at the pump.

articles.author: Nathaniel Meyersohn, CNN Business
articles.title: Why New Jersey and Oregon still don't let you pump your own gas
articles.description: Every state has lifted its ban on self-service gas. Except for New Jersey and Oregon.

articles.title: Here's what it would mean to these Americans if Biden canceled student loan debt
articles.description: About 43 million people are waiting to find out if President Joe Biden will wipe away all or part of their federal student loan debt. CNN spoke with eight former college students about what it would mean for them if Biden canceled some student loan debt.

articles.title: The best cure for high gas prices could be -- high gas prices
articles.description: There's not a lot that Joe Biden, Congress or the Federal Reserve can do to bring down the record high gas prices. High gas prices themselves might do the job for them.
